# HMCharacteristicValueHeatingCooling.auto

**Case**

Unit is set to automatic.

## Declaration

```swift
case auto
```

## Accesory State

- **HMCharacteristicValueHeatingCooling.off**: Unit is set to off, neither heating nor cooling.
- **HMCharacteristicValueHeatingCooling.heat**: Unit is set to heating.
- **HMCharacteristicValueHeatingCooling.cool**: Unit is set to cooling.

items.description: Unit is set to off, neither heating nor cooling.
